e="preserve"> was a Japanese movie director and screenwriter. He was known for directing and writing the cult-classic "Godzilla vs. Hedorah".
He was an executive producer on the Legendary Pictures's American "Godzilla" movies, "Godzilla" (2014) and ' (2019). He was born in Imabari, Japan.
Banno died of problems caused by a subarachnoid hemorrhage in Kawasaki, Japan on May 7, 2017 at the age of 86.
